title: Attitudes
body:
What I've noticed during my time playing this game, is that when one or two things go wrong, people tend to either flame and make others feel like crap, or just give up outright, thinking that there's never a chance of any comebacks. I've also seen this in champ select, for example, if the captain doesn't ban a particular champion, they'll give up before the game has even begun, or just begin abusing the rest of the team for any mistake. No one wants that kind of a team mate. People play this game to have fun, not to get abused. 

**tl dr:
Next time you're playing and you see something you don't agree with, or someone makes a mistake, don't cry, don't give up, that doesn't help anyone. **
